system.description:
You craft something quickly, meditating upon the teachings of the Blood-Soaked Hammer.

Spend 1 Beat to put down an Obstacle (Size 1 Height 1, 5 Durability, unclimbable) in an adjacent square. The obstacle doesn't suffer hits from collides. When you make it collide with another fighter, inflict 2 Hits instead.

Wiswakama Architecture: Spend 2 Beats to put down a size 2 height 2 obstacle instead.
system.flavor: A popular technick of warsmiths, who are taught it since the first day of their training. The Warsmith revels in the holy act of Creation. The sacred act, the first act, done without an extant cause. With hammer and anvil and ingenuity they become more than what they are.
